name: ChiliChomp
description:
Welcome - to this fiery food eating competition!

With the brand-new conveyor belt, all you need to do is chew, drink and keep your cool as you’re aiming to win in this bustling battle for the top!

Chili Chomp is a competitive single-player game, where each contestant is served spicy food on a conveyor belt. Key features include popular face-tracking and AR technique, that lets the player eat food (or not) by opening and closing their mouth and drinking water by turning their head, all while keeping the tolerance meter in check. In this frenzy of goofy animations and spicy food extravaganza, players compete for the ultimate championship. Highest score wins!

Installing instructions:

As of now, this game can only be played on (fairly new) phones with the Android OS that support ARCore. For details, check https://developers.google.com/ar/discover/supported-devices. 

 We're currently working hard on an emulator version for the rest of you! :) 

Alternative 1 (if player has access to an android smartphone):

  • Download the APK to your android smartphone.
  • Install the game.
  • Allow access to camera.
  • Play!
